trans-unit.source: Contains information that defines a band in a rebar control

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify the band style. This value can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Flags that specify the band style.
This value can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Flags that specify the band style.
This value can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_BREAK - The band is on a new line.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_BREAK - The band is on a new line.

target.mrk: $RBBS_BREAK - The band is on a new line.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_CHILDEDGE - The band has an edge at the top and bottom of the child window.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_CHILDEDGE - The band has an edge at the top and bottom of the child window.

target.mrk: $RBBS_CHILDEDGE - The band has an edge at the top and bottom of the child window.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_FIXEDBMP - The background bitmap does not move when the band is resized.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_FIXEDBMP - The background bitmap does not move when the band is resized.

target.mrk: $RBBS_FIXEDBMP - The background bitmap does not move when the band is resized.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_FIXEDSIZE - The band can't be sized. With this style, the sizing grip is not displayed on the band.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_FIXEDSIZE - The band can't be sized.
With this style, the sizing grip is not displayed on the band.

target.mrk: $RBBS_FIXEDSIZE - The band can't be sized.
With this style, the sizing grip is not displayed on the band.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS - Version 4.71. The band will always have a sizing grip, even if it is the only band in the rebar.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS - Version 4.71.
The band will always have a sizing grip, even if it is the only band in the rebar.

target.mrk: $RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS - Version 4.71.
The band will always have a sizing grip, even if it is the only band in the rebar.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_HIDDEN - The band will not be visible.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_HIDDEN - The band will not be visible.

target.mrk: $RBBS_HIDDEN - The band will not be visible.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_NOGRIPPER - Version 4.71. The band will never have a sizing grip, even if there is more than one band in the rebar.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_NOGRIPPER - Version 4.71.
The band will never have a sizing grip, even if there is more than one band in the rebar.

target.mrk: $RBBS_NOGRIPPER - Version 4.71.
The band will never have a sizing grip, even if there is more than one band in the rebar.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Version 5.80. Show a chevron button if the band is smaller than cxIdeal.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Version 5.80.
Show a chevron button if the band is smaller than cxIdeal.

target.mrk: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Version 5.80.
Show a chevron button if the band is smaller than cxIdeal.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT - Version 4.71. The band can be resized by the rebar control; cyIntegral and cyMaxChild affect how the rebar will resize the band.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT - Version 4.71.
The band can be resized by the rebar control; cyIntegral and cyMaxChild affect how the rebar will resize the band.

target.mrk: $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT - Version 4.71.
The band can be resized by the rebar control; cyIntegral and cyMaxChild affect how the rebar will resize the band.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_NOVERT - Don't show when vertical.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_NOVERT - Don't show when vertical.

target.mrk: $RBBS_NOVERT - Don't show when vertical.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Display drop-down button.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Display drop-down button.

target.mrk: $RBBS_USECHEVRON - Display drop-down button.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_HIDETITLE - Keep band title hidden.

seg-source.mrk: $RBBS_HIDETITLE - Keep band title hidden.

target.mrk: $RBBS_HIDETITLE - Keep band title hidden.

trans-unit.source: $RBBS_TOPALIGN - Keep band in top row.

trans-unit.source: If hbmBack specifies a background bitmap, these members are ignored.

seg-source.mrk: If hbmBack specifies a background bitmap, these members are ignored.

target.mrk: If hbmBack specifies a background bitmap, these members are ignored.

trans-unit.source: By default, the band will use the background color of the rebar control set with the $RB_SETBKCOLOR message.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the band will use the background color of the rebar control set with the $RB_SETBKCOLOR message.

target.mrk: By default, the band will use the background color of the rebar control set with the $RB_SETBKCOLOR message.

trans-unit.source: If a background color is specified here, then this background color will be used instead.

seg-source.mrk: If a background color is specified here, then this background color will be used instead.

target.mrk: If a background color is specified here, then this background color will be used instead.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a buffer that contains the display text for the band.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a buffer that contains the display text for the band.

target.mrk: Pointer to a buffer that contains the display text for the band.

trans-unit.source: If band information is being requested from the control and $RBBIM_TEXT is specified in fMask, this member must be initialized to the address of the buffer that will receive the text.

seg-source.mrk: If band information is being requested from the control and $RBBIM_TEXT is specified in fMask, this member must be initialized to the address of the buffer that will receive the text.

target.mrk: If band information is being requested from the control and $RBBIM_TEXT is specified in fMask, this member must be initialized to the address of the buffer that will receive the text.

trans-unit.source: Size of the buffer at lpText, in bytes. If information is not being requested from the control, this member is ignored.

seg-source.mrk: Size of the buffer at lpText, in bytes.
If information is not being requested from the control, this member is ignored.

target.mrk: Size of the buffer at lpText, in bytes.
If information is not being requested from the control, this member is ignored.

trans-unit.source: 0-based index of any image that should be displayed in the band. The image list is set using the $RB_SETBARINFO message.

seg-source.mrk: 0-based index of any image that should be displayed in the band.
The image list is set using the $RB_SETBARINFO message.

target.mrk: 0-based index of any image that should be displayed in the band.
The image list is set using the $RB_SETBARINFO message.

trans-unit.source: Handle to the child window contained in the band, if any.

target.mrk: Handle to the child window contained in the band, if any.

trans-unit.source: Minimum width of the child window, in pixels. The band can't be sized smaller than this value.

The band can't be sized smaller than this value.

target.mrk: Minimum width of the child window, in pixels.
The band can't be sized smaller than this value.

trans-unit.source: Version 4.71. Initial height of the band, in pixels. This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

Step value by which the band can grow or shrink, in pixels.

target.mrk: Version 4.71.
Step value by which the band can grow or shrink, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: If the band is resized, it will be resized in steps specified by this value.

seg-source.mrk: If the band is resized, it will be resized in steps specified by this value.

target.mrk: If the band is resized, it will be resized in steps specified by this value.

trans-unit.source: This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

seg-source.mrk: This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

target.mrk: This member is ignored unless the $RBBS_VARIABLEHEIGHT style is specified.

trans-unit.source: Version 4.71. Ideal width of the band, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Version 4.71.
Ideal width of the band, in pixels.

target.mrk: Version 4.71.
Ideal width of the band, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: If the band is maximized to the ideal width (see $RB_MAXIMIZEBAND), the rebar control will attempt to make the band this width.

seg-source.mrk: If the band is maximized to the ideal width (see $RB_MAXIMIZEBAND), the rebar control will attempt to make the band this width.

target.mrk: If the band is maximized to the ideal width (see $RB_MAXIMIZEBAND), the rebar control will attempt to make the band this width.

seg-source.mrk: Version 4.71.
Application-defined value.

target.mrk: Version 4.71.
Application-defined value.

trans-unit.source: Version 4.71. Size of the band's header, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Version 4.71.
Size of the band's header, in pixels.

target.mrk: Version 4.71.
Size of the band's header, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: The band header is the area between the edge of the band and the edge of the child window.

seg-source.mrk: The band header is the area between the edge of the band and the edge of the child window.

target.mrk: The band header is the area between the edge of the band and the edge of the child window.

trans-unit.source: This is the area where band text and images are displayed, if they are specified.

seg-source.mrk: This is the area where band text and images are displayed, if they are specified.

target.mrk: This is the area where band text and images are displayed, if they are specified.

trans-unit.source: If this value is specified, it will override the normal header dimensions that the control calculates for the band.

seg-source.mrk: If this value is specified, it will override the normal header dimensions that the control calculates for the band.

target.mrk: If this value is specified, it will override the normal header dimensions that the control calculates for the band.
